desciption-58:
Herbal Spa Ilidža: Enjoy a Luxury Spa Experience
Herbal Spa, located at Mustafa Pintola 25Bm Ilidža, offers an incredibly relaxing experience that will meet all your expectations. This exclusive spa center offers superior service, diverse content and a peaceful atmosphere, creating an ideal place for relaxation and relaxation.
The service at the Herbal Spa is outstanding. The staff is friendly, professional and attentive, giving you the feeling that you are in the center of attention. Professional therapists are dedicated to your satisfaction and individual needs, adapting treatments to your wishes and preferences.
Prices at Herbal Spa are affordable, offering excellent value for money. The spa has flexible payment options, accepting cards and cash. This makes it easy for guests to pay for services in a way that suits them best. If you are wondering what the prices are at Herbal Spa Ilidža? They range from 3KM to 185KM and they depend on the treatment itself and its duration.
The atmosphere in the Herbal Spa is calm, relaxing and pleasant. The interior of the spa center is carefully decorated, combining natural elements, soothing colors and relaxing music to create a harmonious environment. Here you will feel as if you have escaped from everyday stress and immersed in an oasis of peace.
Herbal Spa offers a diverse selection of facilities that will satisfy all your needs. Treatments include massages, aromatherapy, reflexology, face and body treatments and many others. Regardless of your wants or needs, Herbal Spa has something for everyone.
Welcome to Herbal Spa - Ilidža, a place that provides the ultimate experience of body care and mind relaxation. Our spa offers a wide range of services, including blow-drying, manicures and pedicures, facials, body treatments and massages. Here you will find everything you need to refresh, renew and revitalize your body and spirit.
Hair blow drying at the Herbal Spa is adapted to all hair lengths. Regardless of whether you have short, medium length or long hair, our expert hairdressers will provide you with a perfectly styled hairstyle. We also offer blow-drying with keratin for additional hair care and shine. Prices are affordable and range from 15KM to 60KM.
At Herbal Spa, we provide exceptional care for your hands and feet. Our manicures and pedicures include classic and De Luxe options. We offer permanent polish and nail polish with high quality OPI products. We also perform corrections, removal of permanent varnish and gel. Leave it to our experts and feel the freshness and beauty of your hands and feet. The prices of these services range from 5KM to 60KM
Facial treatments at the Herbal Spa are designed to make your skin radiant and nourished. Our experts use the latest techniques and products to provide treatments that will meet all your needs. From deep cleansing with the addition of collagen and gold particles, to surface cleansing with algae and Dead Sea minerals, we have everything your skin needs. We also offer facial massages, a collagen mask and other luxurious treatments. Facial treatment prices range from 20KM to 185KM
Enjoy body treatments that will provide you with complete relaxation and refreshment. From pearl treatments, lavender journeys to body scrubs and masks, each treatment is carefully crafted to give you an incredible experience. Our experts use the highest quality products and techniques. Prices for body treatments range from 15KM to 180KM.

Enjoy a relaxing massage that will release tension from your body and soothe your spirit. Massage prices range from 35KM to 170KM.
In the Herbal Spa on Ilidža, you can use eyebrow and eyelash treatments. Shaping eyebrows with thread costs 15 KM, as does eyebrow bleaching.
At Herbal Spa, your satisfaction comes first. All treatments are carefully designed to provide maximum relaxation and care, using high quality products and techniques. Feel the stress melt away as you surrender to the expert hands of the therapist.
Discover the Herbal Spa on Ilidža and experience an exceptional spa experience that will refresh and renew you.
description-10:
Union Jack Billiards Club - The perfect place to enjoy billiards and relax in Sarajevo
Union Jack Billiard Club is one of the most popular destinations for billiard fans in Sarajevo and is located at Trg herojaja 32.
The service provided by Union Jack Billiard Club is excellent. The club staff is very friendly, accommodating and professional. Regardless of your level of billiards experience, the staff will be there to provide support and advice. The club prides itself on high quality pool tables and equipment, ensuring that you have an amazing gaming experience.
The prices at the Union Jack Billiards Club are affordable and adapted to different budgets. The club offers different prices and game packages, allowing you to choose the option that best suits your needs. Also, the club often has special offers and discounts, providing added value to its visitors.
The atmosphere in the club is pleasant and relaxing. The club is elegantly decorated, with comfortable seating and pleasant lighting. The music in the background creates an atmosphere that encourages you to relax and enjoy the game. Union Jack Billiards Club attracts a diverse group of players, creating a vibrant atmosphere of friendly competition and camaraderie.
In terms of convenience, the club offers parking near the Union Jack, making it easy for visitors to come and go. Also, the club provides free internet access for all visitors, allowing you to stay connected and share your pool moments with friends via social networks.
When it comes to the pet-friendly policy, pets are not allowed in the club premises in order to preserve the hygiene and comfort of all visitors.
Regarding payment methods, Union Jack Billiard Club accepts cash payments.
Like other billiard clubs, in the SBK Unino Jack billiard club you have the option of a live game to enjoy a variety of hot and cold drinks.
The advantages of this club are excellent service, affordable prices, pleasant atmosphere and high quality equipment. The only potential downside we could notice is that at peak times the club can be quite busy, so it is advisable to make a reservation before your arrival to ensure your spot.
Visit the Union Jack Billiards Club and enjoy the ultimate billiards experience. This club will delight you with its service and pleasant atmosphere, and provide an unforgettable billiards experience.
description-100:
Restaurant Kilim is located in the heart of Ilidža in Sarajevo and is one of the favorite restaurants in the city. The restaurant offers a wide selection of dishes from Bosnian, Mediterranean and international cuisine, and also offers vegetarian dishes.
This cafe restaurant is located in Ilidža, on the bank of the river Željeznica, on the ground floor of the residential and commercial building Ilidža River Building, close to the main road.
When it comes to food quality, Kilim Restaurant really impresses. All ingredients are fresh and carefully selected, and dishes are prepared with great care and expertise.
The service at the Kilim restaurant is very professional and friendly, and the staff is always ready to help and recommend dishes. The atmosphere in the restaurant is pleasant and relaxing, with pleasant music in the background that does not disturb the conversation of the guests. We should highlight the closed garden from which you can enjoy the view of the nearby river.
The prices at the Kilim restaurant are decent and in line with the quality of the food and the service they offer. For one dish and drink, the average price per person is about 25 KM (about 12.5 euros). You can pay your bill in Kilim restaurant with cash or card.
A restaurant that satisfies delicious desires and a pleasant atmosphere is the one where everyone wants to spend their time. The restaurant "Kilim" is just like that. You can find international, Mediterranean, Italian, French, vegetarian and Mexican cuisine, as well as fast food. With a wide selection of dishes, the restaurant offers an a la carte menu for breakfast, lunch, dinner and late dinner. and dessert.
The restaurant has a capacity for 180 people and offers the possibility of reservations. This is an ideal place for organizing birthday parties, social dinners, business meetings and other events.
Along with excellent food, you can enjoy a wide selection of drinks at "Kilim", including coffee, tea, still and carbonated drinks and cocktails. All visitors also have access to Wi-Fi. The restaurant has separate zones for smokers and those who do not consume tobacco products. If you come with a car, the Kilim restaurant has a free parking lot where you can leave your car.
All in all, the Kilim restaurant is an excellent choice for anyone who wants to enjoy delicious food and a pleasant atmosphere. This restaurant is definitely one of the best in town, and I highly recommend it to anyone visiting Sarajevo.
description-101:
Vapiano is a restaurant located in the center of Sarajevo and is one of the most popular options among visitors who want to enjoy delicious food and a relaxed atmosphere. This restaurant is known for its Italian and Mediterranean cuisine and authentic dishes prepared from fresh ingredients.
The service at Vapian is extremely high-quality and friendly, and the employees are always ready to help and answer guests' questions. When it comes to food, the restaurant offers a wide selection of dishes and pizzas, and guests have the opportunity to choose the ingredients themselves and adjust the dishes to their taste. There are also dishes for vegetarians, as well as a gluten-free option.
In addition to excellent food, you can enjoy coffee, wine and other drinks at Vapian.
The prices at Vapian are affordable and in line with the quality of the food and service. The atmosphere in the restaurant is relaxed and modern, and the interior is contemporary and attractive.
When it comes to parking, the restaurant does not have its own parking space, but public parking spaces can be found nearby, as well as parking in nearby centers such as SCC and Alta, where the restaurant itself is located. The restaurant offers free Wi-Fi, which is a great option for those who want to work or surf the web while enjoying their food.
When it comes to pets, Vapiano is not a pet-friendly restaurant, which may be a disadvantage for some guests. When it comes to payment, guests can use cards or cash.
The advantages of this restaurant are definitely quality food, friendly service, modern atmosphere and affordable prices. However, the lack of a pet-friendly policy and the lack of a private parking space can be problematic for some guests.
In any case, if you are looking for a restaurant with great food, a modern atmosphere and friendly service, Vapiano is definitely worth a visit.
description-102:
Fuka is a popular cafe located in the center of Sarajevo that is attractive to lovers of coffee and delicious food. When it comes to service, Fuka offers very friendly staff who are always ready to help guests. The staff will be happy to recommend a dish or drink, and the guest care is at a high level.
Fuka represents a space on two floors located in the epicenter of the city, at the address Ferhadija 1. In addition to specialty coffee, the Fuka team has also developed a special menu that will accompany this concept, smart food. The gastronomic philosophy of Fuka smart food is based on the selection of local ingredients grown by small producers, with minimal thermal processing and adapted to a concept in which coffee is an absolute priority and the star of this concept.
The atmosphere in Fuka is very pleasant and relaxing. The enjoyment in the cafe is completed by the music playing in the background. The cafe is clean and tidy.
The quality of food and drinks in Fuka is excellent, and the ambiance of the cafe is ideal for hanging out with friends or business meetings. Fuka also offers Wi-Fi service, making it an ideal place to work or study.
All in all, Fuka is a cafe that offers excellent service, delicious food and quality drinks. While the prices are slightly higher than average, the quality of the food and service justifies the price. In the cafe "Fuka" you can pay your bill with cash or card. The cafe is an ideal place for socializing and relaxing.
description-103:
Tesla Pub is one of the most popular pubs in Sarajevo, and it is located in the very center of the city. This popular destination offers excellent service, a good atmosphere and a large selection of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. In the following, we will evaluate this pub in detail according to all relevant factors.
The service at Tesla Pub is top notch. The staff is very friendly, professional and approachable, which creates a pleasant atmosphere for guests. In addition, fast service and attention to guests further enhance the experience.
Prices at Tesla Pub are affordable, considering the location and quality of food and drinks. Some of the popular choices include domestic and imported beer, cocktails and wines.
The atmosphere in the Tesla Pub is very pleasant. The rustic interior design creates a relaxing and friendly atmosphere. Also, the music played is very diverse, which appeals to different tastes and contributes to an unforgettable time.
The quality of drinks at Tesla Pub is excellent. The drinks offer includes premium beers, cocktails and wines, and such an offer makes Tesla Pub an ideal place for a pleasant drink in the company of friends.
In terms of convenience, Tesla Pub offers free internet and a friendly atmosphere. Telsa Pub is not pet friendly inside the smog pub, but you can bring your pet to this pub and enjoy the outside part of the Tesla. In addition, parking is not available, but you can find public parking nearby.
When it comes to payment, guests can use cards and cash, which makes the payment process easier.
If you want to visit Tesla in the evening or during the weekend, it is recommended to reserve a place before your arrival.
One of the advantages of Tesla Pub is definitely its location, which makes it an ideal place to gather friends or take a break after visiting the city. In addition, friendly staff and a wide selection of drinks further enhance the experience.
The only downside to the Tesla Pub is the lack of parking nearby, but that shouldn't be a problem if you use public parking or public transportation.
In conclusion, Tesla Pub is definitely a place worth visiting.
description-104:
Paper Moon is a top restaurant located in Grbavica at Hamdija Čemerlića 45, which offers its guests an unforgettable gastronomic experience. This restaurant is characterized by excellent service, quality food, a pleasant atmosphere and a modern ambience.
The service at Paper Moon is exceptional, as evidenced by numerous positive guest reviews. The staff is extremely friendly and professional, ready to help guests choose food and drinks, and to provide them with all the necessary information.
The food is absolutely fantastic and a real feast for all the senses. The restaurant prides itself on its excellent Italian cuisine, Mediterranean cuisine, and also offers some dishes with an international touch. All ingredients are carefully selected and prepared, and all this is complemented by beautiful presentations of the dishes.
The prices are adapted to the quality of the food and service they provide, and are slightly higher than other restaurants in the city. However, it is really worth paying more for this unforgettable dining experience. The restaurant accepts payment in cash and by card.
The atmosphere at Paper Moon is very pleasant and relaxing, which makes it an ideal place for a romantic dinner, birthday celebration or business lunch. The restaurant is modernly decorated, with well-chosen details that create a feeling of comfort and relaxation.
As for vegetarian preferences, Paper Moon has plenty of options for them. There is a separate menu for vegetarian specialties, so they will surely find something to their taste. The restaurant also offers gluten-free options.
The availability of parking can be a problem due to the smaller capacity, but there are several public parking lots near the restaurant. Paper Moon also offers free internet to its guests.
If you want to be sure that you will have a place in Paper Moon, you need to reserve a place before your arrival.
Unfortunately, the restaurant is not pet friendly, but that does not diminish the quality of the food and service they provide.
The advantages of Paper Moon are an unforgettable gastronomic experience, top service, quality food, a pleasant atmosphere and a modern ambience. Disadvantages could be slightly higher prices and the unavailability of parking.
All in all, Paper Moon is a top-notch restaurant that provides its guests with an exceptional experience of enjoying top-notch food and service, and is definitely recommended for a visit.
description-105:
Dos Hermanos is a restaurant located in the center of Sarajevo. In addition to delicious dishes and an exceptional range of drinks, Dos Hermanos restaurant also stands out for its fantastically decorated interior. The concept of Dos Hermanos restaurant is based on hedonism, ultimate enjoyment of food, drink and the environment in which you are.
The service at Dos Hermanos restaurant is excellent. The staff is friendly and fast, and they are always ready to help you choose food or drink. The restaurant with a capacity of 100 seats offers the option of reservation. Reservations are recommended, especially in the evening when the restaurant is usually full.
As for the food, the type of cuisine that the restaurant offers is Mediterranean and Italian, which allows visitors to enjoy different dishes from these cuisines. The restaurant offers an a la carte menu with a variety of dishes for breakfast, lunch, dinner and late dinner, as well as desserts. For vegetarians, the restaurant has several options that are delicious and satisfying. A special thing in the preparation of meat specialties are dry aging and wet aging technologies, as well as sous vide cooking techniques, which aim to provide you with the best of the ingredients. The quality of food at Dos Hermanos restaurant is excellent. All ingredients are fresh, and dishes are prepared in the traditional way with authentic spices and spicy sauces.
In addition, the restaurant has a selection of alcoholic beverages, including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails. As for non-alcoholic drinks, the restaurant offers coffee, tea, still and carbonated drinks.
Along with delicious food and drinks, the restaurant also offers free Wi-Fi, which is perfect for those who want to work or relax with something good to eat or drink. You can pay your bill in Dos Hermanos restaurant with cash or card.
Overall, this restaurant offers good value for money, an excellent selection of food and drinks and a pleasant atmosphere. Whether you are looking for a place for breakfast, lunch, dinner or late night, this restaurant is sure to provide you with a good selection of dishes for every meal.
description-106:
Caffe bar Zlatna ribica in Sarajevo is a popular bar among coffee and cocktail lovers. Zlatna ribica is a cafe bar that exudes specificity, mysticism, unique interior and is a proven location for a pleasant daytime coffee or a relaxed night out. Zlatna Ribica is located near the main city promenade at Kaptol 5, Sarajevo.
The entrance to the building already emphasizes the specific decoration, and when you walk through the front door, you will be greeted by a unique decor. The interior of the building is full of decorative details, coins, tapestries, photographs, frames of various shapes, postcards, love messages, posters of festivals and drama performances that are randomly arranged in the so-called "orderly chaos". Speaking of the interior, it is inevitable to mention the facility's toilet, which will bring a smile to your face with its specificity. See for yourself what it's all about during your visit!
The service in this coffee bar is of high quality, and the staff is friendly and accommodating. Prices are affordable and in line with city standards. The atmosphere is relaxed and pleasant, ideal for hanging out with friends or relaxing with a good book.
The quality of coffee and other drinks in the Zlatna ribica coffee bar is excellent, with a large selection of quality coffees and cocktails that you can order. The offer also includes freshly squeezed juices, healthy drinks and other drinks of your choice.
Reservations are required for the Zlatna ribica coffee bar because the cafe is often filled to the last seat.
Parking is not available, but public parking is only a few minutes' walk from the coffee bar. Free internet is available for all visitors, which is a great option for those who want to work or simply surf the web while enjoying a drink.
Caffe Bar Zlatna ribica is not pet friendly, which can be a disadvantage for pet owners. Payment can be made by card or cash, which allows greater flexibility for visitors.
The advantages of this coffee bar are its good service, quality of drinks and affordable prices, while the disadvantage could be the lack of parking nearby.
Overall, Zlatna ribica coffee bar in Sarajevo is a great choice for anyone looking for good coffee, cocktails or other drinks, with a pleasant atmosphere and affordable prices.
description-107:
Spazio Caffé is a popular cafe located in the heart of Sarajevo, known for its relaxed atmosphere and delicious food. In this text, we will rate Spazio Caffé on various factors, such as service, food, price, atmosphere and quality.
The service at Spazio Caffé is very good. The staff is friendly, helpful and quick, and always ready to help their guests. When it comes to food, you can enjoy delicious sandwiches, salads and other dishes at Spazio Caffé. There are also a variety of beverages, including coffee, tea, juices and alcoholic beverages. Prices are affordable, which is a significant plus in a city like Sarajevo, where prices are often higher than in other cities.
The atmosphere at Spazio Caffé is relaxed and pleasant. The place is decorated modern and has a cool vibe. The ambience is furnished with various details and is a very cozy and pleasant place to enjoy cocktails, it is important to note that wifi is available for guests, so visitors can work or socialize online while enjoying a drink or food.
The cakes are created according to a unique recipe, and with them, the sweet program also includes some desserts that you will not easily find in Sarajevo, such as Affogato Coffee. If you are hungry, try toast, salad or one of the delicious sandwiches from the savory program. It is important to note that all food is fresh and from our own production, and at Spazio Caffe you often have the opportunity to try something new.
This cafe also offers a health corner with a wide range of fruit salads, smoothies and healthy iced teas, and you can also choose squeezed fruit and vegetable juice as you wish.
As for vegetarian options, Spazio Caffé offers several options for vegetarians. In addition, Spazio Caffé also offers gluten-free food options.
Parking is not a problem, as there are numerous parking spaces nearby. As for pets, Spazio Caffé is not pet friendly, but during warmer days you can use the garden where pets are welcome. The restaurant accepts payment by card, which is very convenient for guests who do not have cash. If you plan to come in large numbers or a little later during the day, it is recommended to reserve a place.
Spazio Caffé's strengths include good service, delicious food, affordable prices, a relaxed atmosphere, and the availability of wifi.
In short, Spazio Caffé is an excellent choice for those looking for a relaxed place to enjoy delicious food and drinks in the center of Sarajevo. If you are looking for good service, affordable prices and a modern atmosphere, you should definitely visit Spazio Caffé.
description-108:
The 4-star Holiday Sarajevo Hotel is a modern hotel located opposite the National Museum, near the Alta and SCC shopping centers. The hotel offers various facilities for all types of travelers, from business travelers to tourists looking for a relaxing vacation in Sarajevo.
The service at the Holiday Sarajevo hotel is very professional and friendly. The staff is always ready to help guests and provide them with everything they need for a pleasant stay. The food in the hotel is delicious and varied, with a rich breakfast that includes traditional Bosnian dishes.
Guests can enjoy traditional Bosnian cuisine and international specialties served in the National Restaurant. Room service is available 24 hours a day. Caffe Inn within the facility offers guests the opportunity to relax during the day or have fun in the evening.
The lobby of the Holiday Hotel offers numerous facilities such as a tobacco shop, various boutiques, car rental services and a currency exchange office. The hotel also offers well-equipped conference rooms with state-of-the-art AV and translation equipment.
Sarajevo Airport is 10 km away. Jahorina Ski Center is a 30-minute drive from the Holiday Hotel. Free parking is provided in the garage within the facility.
According to the provisions of the law, smoking is prohibited in all rooms.
Hotel Holiday in Sarajevo offers 364 comfortably furnished rooms and 16 suites. All rooms are air-conditioned and include TV with satellite channels, mini bar. Each room has its own bathroom with bathtub, hairdryer and bathrobe.
The prices in the hotel are very competitive and affordable, considering the quality of service and facilities that the hotel offers. The hotel also offers additional amenities such as free parking and free internet for all guests.
The hotel also offers a gym for those who want to stay in shape during their stay at the hotel. In addition to the gym there are many other relaxing attractions such as an indoor swimming pool, a spa and wellness center and beauty and hair salons.
In addition to the mentioned attractions, there are other various activities such as billiards and table tennis. In addition, the hotel is close to all major attractions in Sarajevo, making it ideal for tourists who want to explore the city.
One of the advantages of the hotel is that it can be paid by card or cash, which makes it easier for guests to pay. However, one of the disadvantages of the hotel is that the hotel is not five friednly.
All in all, Hotel Holiday Sarajevo is a great choice for travelers looking for quality accommodation at a reasonable price. The hotel offers all the necessary facilities and amenities, along with professional service and friendly staff that will make your stay in Sarajevo as pleasant as possible.
description-109:
Hotel Europe Sarajevo is located in the heart of Sarajevo, and stands out as one of the most luxurious hotels in the city with 5 stars. This hotel received the award for the best hotel in Bosnia and Herzegovina, and it really has a lot to offer.
Upon entering the lobby, every stay at the Hotel Europe is like a journey led by friendly staff. You will be greeted by light music and an attractive interior worth exploring. The spirit of the past is preserved in the traditional part of the hotel with ornate decor colored by the years, while the new part is done in a modern style and is characterized by great beauty.
The service at Hotel Europe Sarajevo is excellent, the guests are very satisfied with the professionalism and friendliness of the hotel staff. The staff is always at the guests' service, and is dedicated to making them feel at home. The food at the hotel is also excellent, with many options for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The prices are quite high, but the quality of the food justifies the price.
The atmosphere of the hotel is very elegant and modern, and the hotel exudes luxury in every sense. The quality of the hotel is at the highest level, which is reflected in everything, from the interior to the service. The hotel also offers many additional activities, such as a spa center, gym, indoor pool, sauna, hammam, and various treatments and massages.
Hotel Europe Sarajevo offers free Wi-Fi, which is very important for all guests who want to stay connected to the world during their stay. Also, the hotel has a large parking space that is available for guests arriving by car. The hotel is not pet-friendly.
Hotel Europe is ideal for business trips and meetings because the hotel has conference halls, lounge areas, and spacious restaurants. The hotel also offers the services of a personal assistant.
The hotel offers 160 luxury rooms, 14 suites, family rooms and non-smoking rooms.
Hotel Europe Sarajevo accepts payment by card and cash, and there are various discounts and offers that guests can take advantage of. However, hotel prices are quite high, which can be a problem for some guests who want to stay in a luxury hotel but have a limited budget.
The advantages of this hotel are a luxurious atmosphere, excellent service, excellent food, spa center, gym and swimming pool, free Wi-Fi and a large parking area. The disadvantages of the hotel are the high prices, which can be a problem for some guests, and the fact that the hotel is not pet friendly.
All in all, Hotel Europe Sarajevo is a very luxurious hotel that offers top service and a very high quality stay in the heart of Sarajevo. Although the prices are quite high, guests get a lot for their money and that is what makes this hotel unique. If you are looking for a top-quality stay in Sarajevo, Hotel Europe Sarajevo is the right choice for you.
description-11:
Dynamic Billiard Club - An oasis for billiard lovers in Sarajevo
Dynamic Billiard Club is a prominent billiards club located at Enisa Srne 22.
The service provided by Dynamic Billiard Club is extremely high quality. The club staff is professional, friendly and always ready to fulfill all your needs. Regardless of your skill level in the game of billiards, one of the staff will support you and help you improve your skills. In addition, the club offers individual or group training for those who want to dive deeper into the world of billiards.
In terms of pricing, Dynamic Billiard Club offers reasonable rates that reflect the high quality of service and space. Tickets and game hours can be adjusted to your needs and budget. The club also offers various packages and offers that can provide you with additional benefits and discounts. The price for one hour of playing is 5 KM, and if you want to avoid the crowds, it is recommended to make a reservation before your arrival.
The atmosphere at Dynamic Billiard Club is energetic and dynamic. The club is modernly designed with comfortable seating and enough space to play. Lighting effects create a special atmosphere and add a dose of excitement. The quality of the equipment in the club is top notch, with carefully maintained tables and quality billiard props.
Dynamic Billiard Club offers free internet access for all visitors, allowing you to stay connected during your visit or share your experience with friends on social networks. The club also has available parking nearby, which is convenient and makes it easier for visitors to come and go.
When it comes to the club's pet-friendly policy, pets are not allowed in the club's premises to preserve hygiene.
Regarding payment methods, Dynamic Billiard Club accepts cash payments.
Just like other billiard clubs, in the Dynamic billiard club you have the option of a game to enjoy a variety of hot and cold drinks.
The advantages of this club are high-quality service, affordable prices, energetic atmosphere and top-quality equipment. A downside we might notice is that the club can get crowded during the weekend, so it's advisable to book in advance to secure your spot.
In conclusion, Dynamic Billiard Club is a great place for all billiard lovers in Sarajevo. Visit the club and experience the ultimate billiards experience in a dynamic environment. Your passion for billiards will find its satisfaction in this club that provides excellent service and an unforgettable experience.
description-110:
The 5-star Hills Sarajevo Hotel is one of the most prestigious hotels in Sarajevo and offers high-quality service, modern equipment and a luxurious ambience. This hotel is ideal for all guests who are looking for superior accommodation and want to enjoy excellent service. Hotel Hills is located about 2km from the airport.
The service at Hotel Hills Sarajevo is at a high level, and the staff is extremely friendly and professional. Hotel guests have at their disposal a 24-hour reception service, room service and laundry service. In addition, the hotel also offers services for organizing events and meetings in modern conference rooms and is ideal for organizing weddings and other events.
The restaurants of the Hotel Hills Sarajevo offer a wide selection of delicious dishes and drinks. Guests can enjoy various dishes of Bosnian and international cuisine in restaurants with a beautiful view. In addition, the hotel also has bars where guests can relax with a drink and socialize.
The hotel offers 330 rooms and suites. The rooms are divided into business rooms, business rooms and non-smoking rooms. Each of the rooms has everything you need from air conditioning, TV, mini bar, toiletries, slippers and hair dryer.
The prices at the Hotel Hills Sarajevo are quite high, but the quality of service is at the level expected from such a luxurious hotel. Guests have at their disposal numerous amenities and activities such as a gym, sauna, outdoor and indoor swimming pool, spa center and other services for relaxation and recreation.
Within the facility you can enjoy activities such as table tennis and billiards, as well as water sports.
Hotel Hills Sarajevo has a large parking space for guests who come with their own vehicles, and free Wi-Fi internet is available to guests in all parts of the hotel. The hotel is also pet friendly and allows pets to be accommodated, but an additional fee is paid for this service.
Transportation from/to the airport can be arranged at a surcharge.
The advantages of Hotel Hills Sarajevo are certainly a high level of service, modern equipment, luxurious ambience and a diverse offer. The flaws could be related to the prices, which are quite high, but considering all the amenities the hotel offers, the price is justified. Hotel Hills Sarajevo is a great choice for anyone looking for top-quality accommodation in Sarajevo.
description-111:
The 5-star Malak Regency Sarajevo is a luxury hotel located on Ilidža, 12 km from Sarajevo, offering an indoor pool, sauna and fitness center. Guests have free WiFi and free private parking within the facility.
All elegantly decorated rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a mini-bar. Some rooms also have a balcony. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. For your comfort, robes and slippers are provided.
Alcoholic beverages are not served at this hotel.
Guests can enjoy a daily continental breakfast, while the on-site restaurant serves local and international cuisine.
There is a souvenir shop in the hotel, as well as a 24-hour service.
Sarajevo International Airport is 4.2 km away. Hotel Malak Regency offers a transfer from/to the airport at a surcharge.
The service at Malak Regency Sarajevo is excellent, and the staff is very friendly and helpful. The hotel's restaurant offers a wide selection of dishes, and the food is delicious and freshly prepared. The prices in the hotel are a bit higher compared to other hotels in the city, but considering the quality of service and facilities that the hotel offers, the prices are justified.
The atmosphere in Malak Regency Sarajevo is elegant and luxurious, and the hotel offers a high level of comfort and quality. The rooms are spacious, modernly furnished and clean, with comfortable beds and all the necessary facilities for a pleasant stay. Malak offers a wide selection of rooms, so guests can choose from classic rooms, deluxe rooms, premium rooms, royal suites and deluxe suites.
The hotel offers many additional activities and facilities for its guests, including a gym, sauna and massage treatments. The hotel also has an outdoor pool that is open during the summer.
Malak Regency Sarajevo offers free parking and internet for its guests. The hotel is not pet friendly, which is a disadvantage for guests with pets. Guests can pay for their stay by card or cash, which is convenient for all guests.
One of the advantages of this hotel is its excellent location, which is ideal for guests who want peace and quality rest without a lot of noise.
One of the disadvantages of Malak Regency Hotel Sarajevo can be the price, which is a bit higher compared to other hotels in the city.
All in all, Malak Regency Sarajevo is a very good hotel that offers top service, a luxurious ambience and a high level of comfort. With its additional activities and possibilities, this hotel is ideal for all guests who want to enjoy a quality stay in the heart of Sarajevo.
description-112:
Hotel Ibis Styles Sarajevo with 4 stars is a modern and elegant hotel, Hotel ibis Styles Sarajevo is located a 10-minute drive from Sarajevo International Airport and 6.3 km from Latin Bridge. Evaluating the hotel by all factors, we can say that it is an excellent choice for visitors looking for comfortable and affordable accommodation in Sarajevo.

Each room has a minibar, telephone, safe, air conditioning, TV, hair dryer and other facilities that will make every guest's stay at the Ibis Styles hotel easier and better. Some units include a balcony with city or river views. The private bathroom includes a shower and a hairdryer.

ibis Styles Sarajevo is 5.7 km from Sarajevo National Theater and 7.2 km from Baščaršija Street. The mountains Jahorina, Bjelašnica, Igman, Treskavica and Trebević are about 35 km away.

The advantages of this hotel are modern and comfortable accommodation, affordable prices, free parking and internet, friendly staff and good food. The disadvantages would be the fact that the hotel is not pet friendly and that they do not serve alcohol, which some guests will not like.
In short, the Ibis Styles Sarajevo hotel is an excellent choice for visitors looking for comfortable and modern accommodation in the center of Sarajevo. With quality service, good food and affordable prices, this hotel will surely satisfy all your needs and provide you with an unforgettable stay in Sarajevo.
description-113:
Hotel Radon Plaza Sarajevo is a modern 5-star hotel located in the immediate vicinity of Sarajevo International Airport. The hotel has a total of 115 rooms and suites, and offers a number of amenities such as a restaurant, cafe, gym, swimming pool, sauna, spa center and business center.
Each room at this hotel is air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV. The hotel has large windows and therefore Rando Plaza has a lot of daylight, private bathrooms have bathtubs and bidets. For your comfort, bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries are provided.
You can enjoy a panoramic view of the city from the revolving restaurant on the 15th floor where breakfast is also served. Business facilities include 5 conference rooms with a capacity of 1000 people.
There is a 24-hour reception, a hair salon. Laundry and room service can be ordered, and numerous massage and beauty treatments are available for an additional fee.
The center of Sarajevo, which is easily accessible by public transport, is about 7 km from Radon Plaza. Sarajevo Airport is 2.5 km away, and a shuttle service is available at an additional cost.
The service in the hotel is excellent, and the staff is very friendly and helpful. The food in the hotel's restaurant is delicious and varied, and the prices are affordable compared to the quality. The atmosphere in the hotel is modern and pleasant, and all rooms are very clean and tidy.
Hotel Radon Plaza Sarajevo offers free parking for guests arriving by car, as well as free Wi-Fi for all hotel guests. The hotel is pet friendly, which means that pets are welcome, with an additional fee.
Payment in the hotel is made by card or cash, and guests have access to an ATM and a currency exchange. The hotel has a modern gym and relaxation pool, as well as a sauna and spa center for complete relaxation.
Hotel Radon Plaza boasts a prestigious wellness center equipped to the highest standards. All the contents of the Center are designed to meet the needs of the most demanding guests and everyday visitors looking for relaxation, recreation and improvement of the general quality of life and state of mind and body. One of the main advantages of Hotel Radon Plaza Sarajevo is its proximity to the airport, which makes it an ideal choice for travelers looking for a convenient and comfortable place to stay before or after a trip. The only drawback of the hotel is that it is located outside the city center, so guests who want to explore Sarajevo have to travel several kilometers to the tourist attractions. However, the hotel offers transportation to the city center for guests who want it.
Considering all the amenities and services it offers, the Radon Plaza Sarajevo hotel is an excellent choice for all travelers looking for luxurious accommodation at affordable prices near the airport.

description-131:
Caffe Bar Te Amo je mjesto gdje ćete uživati ​​u opuštenoj atmosferi i ukusnoj hrani. Cafe Te Amo nalazi se na adresi Džemala Bijedića 129. Posjetitelji ovog kafića mogu uživati ​​u vrhunskoj usluzi i širokom izboru hrane i pića.
Usluga u ovom kafiću je izuzetno ljubazna i profesionalna. Osoblje je uvijek spremno pomoći i preporučiti nešto novo, a gosti se osjećaju dobrodošli od samog ulaska u bar. Cijene u ovom kafiću su pristupačne, a ponuda jela i pića zaista široka. Bilo da ste ljubitelj kave, čaja, sokova ili alkoholnih pića, Te Amo će vas oduševiti.
Što se tiče hrane, restoran nudi ukusne zalogaje za sve ukuse i sklonosti. Mali izbor vegetarijanskih jela, kao i jela za osobe s posebnim prehrambenim potrebama. Kuhinja ovog restorana nudi razne specijalitete poput ukusnih sendviča, salata, pizza, tjestenina, raznih burgera i palačinki. Cijene hrane i pića su pristupačne i prihvatljive.
Atmosfera u Caffe baru Te Amo je opuštajuća i ugodna. Osim interijera koji je ugodno uređen, tu su i vanjski stolovi. Restoran također nudi besplatan Wi-Fi i parking za goste. Želite li provoditi vrijeme sa svojim kućnim ljubimcima, ovo je idealno mjesto za vas jer je restoran pet friendly.
Prednost ovog kafića je što radi i navečer, pa možete uživati ​​u ukusnoj hrani i piću u opuštenoj atmosferi kasno u noć. Ono što bi se u ovom restoranu moglo unaprijediti je ponuda jela koja se može proširivati.
Ukratko, Caffe Bar Te Amo je mjesto gdje ćete uživati ​​u ukusnoj hrani i piću, dobroj usluzi i opuštajućoj atmosferi. Posjetite ovaj kafić i uživajte u njihovoj ponudi hrane i pića.

description-18:
The Trebević cable car, or as the older Sarajians called it - the funicular, started operating on May 3, 1959, becoming one of the recognizable symbols of the capital of Bosnia and Herzegovina. The route of the cable car, which connected the village of Bistrik on the left bank of the Miljacka with Trebević, the city's favorite picnic spot, the "lungs of Sarajevo", was 2,100 meters long.
There were also small buffets at the stations, and a restaurant of the same name was later built at Vidikovac, with a beautiful garden and an enchanting panoramic view of the city. Already in the first days of the war in 1992, the cable car was destroyed, and Trebević became the front line. The renovated Trebevic cable car was put into service again in April 2018.
The cable car has 33 gondolas, 10 people fit in the gondola, and the ride to Trebević takes about eight minutes. The price of a one-way cable car ride for BiH citizens is 4 KM, while a return ticket costs 6 KM, while a one-way ticket for tourists costs 15 KM, and a return ticket costs 20 KM. There is no charge for the cable car ride for children up to seven years old, passengers who have a bicycle service pay an additional 4 KM, and entry into the cabins is also possible for pets, for which an additional 4 KM is required.
For now, tickets can only be purchased at the departure station, and soon they will be available in the City Hall, as well as at the arrival station. At the arrival station of the cable car, there is Coffee2Go, a restaurant with a fantastic view of Sarajevo. At Trebević itself, visitors can enjoy a beautiful view of the panorama of Sarajevo, as well as a nature walk to the picnic area Brus or Prvi šumar near the Pino Nature hotel. It is also possible to visit the remains of the Olympic bobsleigh track and the Čolina kapa observatory, but also to relax in one of the numerous catering facilities, such as Pino Nature, Brus, Trebevićki raj, Level Up and Villa Andrea.
The Sarajevo cable car, also known as the Trebević cable car, is one of the most famous symbols of Sarajevo. This modern attraction offers visitors incredible views of the city and surrounding mountains, and has become a popular destination for tourists and locals alike.
The service provided by the Trebević cable car is extremely professional and friendly. The staff is well trained and always ready to help visitors. Ticket prices are affordable and adapted to all budgets. Tickets can be purchased with both cash and card, which provides flexibility to visitors.
The atmosphere on the Trebević cable car is incredible. As you climb to the top, you can enjoy a wonderful view of Sarajevo. The panoramic view of the city from the top of Trebević is particularly impressive, offering a fantastic view of houses, green areas and the surrounding mountains. This is an ideal place to take photos and create unforgettable memories.
Trebevićka cable car also offers various facilities for visitors. At the top of the cable car there is a restaurant with traditional Bosnian cuisine, where you can enjoy delicious food and drinks. You can also walk along the trails and enjoy the nature, or visit the viewpoints and see the beautiful landscapes.
The Trebevicka cable car is pet-friendly. Visitors are welcome to bring their pets with them and enjoy a cable car ride and a walk around Trebević. That's great news for dog lovers and all those who like to spend time with their four-legged friends.
In addition to enjoying the beautiful view and nature, you can also see other attractions on the Sarajevo cable car. At the top of Trebević is the Olympic Tower, which was built during the 1984 Winter Olympics. Visitors can visit the tower and enjoy the view from the viewpoints on different levels.
As for parking, the Sarajevo cable car has available parking spaces for visitors who come with their own vehicles. This makes arrival easier and ensures safety for all visitors.
In short, Sarajevo Cable Car or Trebević Cable Car provides an extraordinary experience to all visitors. The service is top-notch, the prices are affordable, the atmosphere is incredible, and the facilities are varied. The cable car is pet-friendly, and at the top of Trebević you can enjoy a wonderful view of Sarajevo and the surrounding mountains. All this makes the Sarajevo cable car an essential attraction when visiting Sarajevo.
description-19:

You can see a wide range of animals in this wonderful zoo. From exotic species such as tigers, lions and zebras, to domestic animals such as rabbits and goats. There are also birds of different species, reptiles and many other interesting inhabitants of the animal kingdom.
It is possible to pay the entrance fee to Pionirska dolina Zoo in cash. Also, the garden offers parking for visitors who come by car. The parking lot is spacious enough and safe.
RULES OF CONDUCT
1. Please, in the zoo:
DO NOT FEED ANIMALS!
DO NOT DISTURB ANIMALS!
DO NOT CROSS THE PROTECTIVE FENCES!
2. Pets are not allowed in the "Pionirska dolina" RZC and the zoo.
3. Bicycles, scooters and electric cars are not allowed in the "Pionirska dolina" RZC and the zoo.
4. Fires are not allowed in the RZC "Pionirska dolina" and the zoo.
5. It is not allowed to throw garbage in the RZC "Pionirska dolina" and the zoo.
6. Photography and recording for private purposes is allowed, and for other purposes, permission from the Management of KJKP "Park" d.o.o. is mandatory. Sarajevo.
7. Children up to 5 (five) years old must be accompanied by an adult!
